titles.title: Christian Seek Not Yet Repose (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christian seek not yet repose Cast thy dreams of ease away Thou art in the midst of foes Watch and pray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Principalities and powers Mustering their unseen array Wait for thy unguarded hours Watch and pray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gird thy heavenly armor on Wear it ever night and day Ambushed lies the evil one Watch and pray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hear the victors who o'ercame Still they mark each warrior's way All with one sweet voice exclaim Watch and pray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hear above all hear thy Lord Him thou lovest to obey Hide within thy heart His word Watch and pray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Watch as if on that alone Hung the issue of the day Pray that help may be sent down Watch and pray{/lang-eng}
